SKU468403.Name: Mason Cork Writing Desk
SKU468403.Description: Cork in painted black brings texture and a major cool factor to the office. Minimalist design features a smooth surface ideal for writing, with a raised edge prime for pinning inspiration. Legs work hard in powdercoated steel and end in solid brass feet. Levelers included. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Top: Painted cork and engineered wood
Base: Powdercoated stainless steel with solid brass feet

SKU506130.Name: Kota Home Office Oak Desk
SKU506130.Description: Dreamt up by Mermelada Estudio, office "desk" hides ample storage and a pull-out keyboard drawer behind two large oak veneer doors with horizontal detailing. Metal glides help keep things on track, and cutouts make way for cords of all types. Open up for business and close off when the guests arrive. Learn about Mermelada Estudio on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Engineered wood with oak veneer and clear matte finish
Includes pull-out keyboard drawer and one adjustable shelf
Clean with a soft cloth; do not use abrasive cleaners

SKU463806.Name: Tether Leather and Metal Desk
SKU463806.Description: Sturdy desk stands firmly on a steel, double-lined leg and tops off with full-grain saddle leather. Looks like it's plucked straight from an upscale, industrial work space but feels minimal enough to do work at home. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Use leather cleaner or wipe with a soft, dry cloth

SKU514182.Name: Mason White Writing Desk
SKU514182.Description: Engineered wood in hi-gloss white brings high-fashion edge to the office. Minimalist design features a sleek surface ideal for writing and favors chairs with a pop of color. Legs work hard in powdercoated steel and end in solid brass feet. Levelers included. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Top: Engineered wood in hi-gloss white
Base: Powdercoated stainless steel with solid brass feet

SKU461967.Name: Avalon Ivory Faux Shagreen Desk
SKU461967.Description: Sleek office number designed by Hettler.Tüllmann gets the hand-wrapped treatment in faux shagreen — a design trend we'll never stop obsessing over. Luxurious, decorative texture goes from top to front to sides and comes to rest on a minimal modern frame with antique brass legs. Center drawer flips down for easy typing and tucks up beautifully to a plush accent chair. Learn about Hettler.Tüllmann on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Engineered wood wrapped in faux shagreen
Three drawers with nickel-plated iron hardware and metal glides

SKU470894.Name: Drommen Whitewashed Desk
SKU470894.Description: Architectural dream designed by Jannis Ellenberger offers a lighter alternative to one of our best sellers. With its solid, sustainable acacia wood in a whitewashed stain, angled desk is a sleek addition to the office. Center drawer drops down for easy typing and features cord management and side drawers for storage. Learn about Jannis Ellenberger on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Top: Engineered wood with acacia veneer and whitewash stain
Frame: Solid acacia wood with whitewash stain
Do not use abrasive cleaners, wax or polish

SKU494396.Name: Bianca Lacquered Linen Parsons Desk
SKU494396.Description: Boxy, structural desk designed by Mermelada Estudio draws inspiration from the modern silhouettes of the 1970s before getting layered in natural raffia. Lacquered for durability, then finished in a hi-gloss white. Features two front-facing drawers and plenty of room for an oversized office chair. Learn about Mermelada Estudio on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Variation across texture and thickness of raffia to be expected

SKU468437.Name: Marisa Burl Wood Desk
SKU468437.Description: Designed by Studio Anansi, rounded edges and chunky half-moon legs give off vintage vibes in a high-end way. Burlwood veneer desk is ideal for small office spaces and would greet guests beautifully in the entryway. Textured goodness with yummy neutral tones. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Burlwood veneer with solid frame and legs
Clean with a soft cloth; do not use abrasive cleaners

SKU471092.Name: Helix 70" Walnut Desk
SKU471092.Description: Party on top, business on the bottom. Three fixed walnut veneer shelves ladder up alongside a powdercoated metal frame and pull double duty as a display/work space. Modularly designed to save room and stand next to our matching Helix walnut bookcase. Stud mounting recommended; hardware included for drywall installation. CB2 exclusive.

productDimensions.description: Top Shelf To Top Of Frame

Features: Shelves: Walnut veneer over engineered wood
Clean with a soft cloth; do not use abrasive cleaners

SKU471115.Name: Helix 96" Walnut Desk
SKU471115.Description: Party on top, business on the bottom. Three fixed walnut veneer shelves pan out in a powdercoated metal frame. Modularly designed to pull double duty as a display/work space and looks even better standing next to our Helix walnut bookcase. Stud mounting recommended; hardware included for drywall installation. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Shelves: Walnut veneer over engineered wood
Clean with a soft cloth; do not use abrasive cleaners

SKU361406.Name: Jaxon Wood and Leather Desk
SKU361406.Description: Topped with brown saddle leather, walnut and iron desk by designer Brett Beldock streamlines the workday. Pair with Jaxon Walnut and Leather Bookcase for full corner-office vibes. Learn more about Brett Beldock on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Dust with soft dry cloth; do not leave spills unattended. Periodically check and tighten hardware as necessary

SKU371584.Name: Elemental Large Wood Desk-Table
SKU371584.Description: GQ table pulls double duty as dining table or desk. Pull up chairs on either side for prime seating or host a party of one for the ultimate work sesh. Plywood in rich oak veneer leaves edges exposed for raw, refined look and ends in unexpected polished brass detailing at feet. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Feet: Polished brass, will age with time
Do not place wet or hot items directly on surface

SKU324433.Name: Ridge Bleached Oak Desk
SKU324433.Description: Bleached oak desk designed by Brett Beldock gets the work done in serious style. Made of bleach-stained Mindi wood with a wire-brushed finish, block leg desk flare to the floor dramatically. Single drawer gives desk supplies and private papers a home. Learn more about Brett Beldock on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Mindi veneer and mdf with bleached stain and wire-brushed finish
Clean with damp cloth; do not use abrasive cleaners

SKU338866.Name: Kent Mahogany Desk
SKU338866.Description: Rich mahogany desk designed by Caleb Zipperer is a piece of work. Contrasting black solid wood legs support mahogany veneer desk top with two drawers for storage. Sleek from all angles, desk can be floated to divide/make a room. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Desktop: FSC mahogany veneer with high gloss lacquer finish
Dust with soft dry cloth; protect from heat and liquids

SKU506618.Name: Drommen Desk
SKU506618.Description: So inclined. Sleek and architectural, wood desk designed by Jannis Ellenberger is a dream from every angle. With its warm tones and graceful grain, solid sustainable acacia wood offers a center drawer that flips down front for easy typing, as well as two side drawers and cord management. A natural complement to the Drommen bed and Standing Mirror. CB2 exclusive.

SKU687884.Name: Go-Cart Black Rolling Desk
SKU687884.Description: Industrial revolutions. Nifty metal office worker in industrial black powdercoat rolls into place on four wheels. Two wheels lock. Go for the full Go-Cart collection to complete the look. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Steel with a black powdercoat finish
Clean with a soft, dry cloth

SKU454133.Name: Go-Cart White Rolling Desk
SKU454133.Description: industrial revolutions. Nifty metal office worker rolls into place on 4 commercial wheels and 1 brite white powdercoat. 2 wheels lock. Also in carbon. Coordinate with a modern office chair for a stylish and functional space.
Features: Steel with a white powdercoat finish

SKU687948.Name: Go-Cart Black Rolling Counter Table-Stand Up Desk
SKU687948.Description: Industrial revolutions. A hard-working addition to our best-selling go-cart collection. Nifty metal construction in industrial black powdercoat rolls into place on four wheels. We love it in the office as a standing desk, as an island/counter in the kitchen, or even as craft table—-wherever you do crafts. Two wheels lock to keep table in place. Go for the full Go-Cart collection. CB2 exclusive.

Dimentions.productName: Go-Cart Black Rolling Counter Table-Stand Up Desk

Features: Clean with a soft, dry cloth

SKU558119.Name: Go-Cart White Rolling Counter Table-Stand Up Desk
SKU558119.Description: industrial revolutions. A hard-working addition to our best-selling go-cart collection. Nifty metal construction rolls into place on 4 commercial wheels and 1 industrial bright white powdercoat. We love it in the office as a standing desk, as an island/counter in the kitchen, or even as craft table—-wherever you do crafts. 2 wheels lock to keep table in place. Go for the full cart collection. Coordinate with a modern office chair for a stylish and functional space.

Dimentions.productName: Go-Cart White Rolling Counter Table-Stand Up Desk

Features: Clean with a soft, dry cloth

SKU506602.Name: Runway Acacia Wood Desk
SKU506602.Description: One sleek piece. Rich acacia wood desk stylishly downsizes for space in the office, entryway or bedroom. Discreet sleek dual drawers organize desk supplies and papers, keys and mail (perfect entry console), even cosmetics (makes a great vanity, too). CB2 exclusive.
Features: Clean with soft dry or damp cloth

SKU452593.Name: Runway White Lacquer Desk
SKU452593.Description: one sleek piece. Hi-gloss white lacquer desk downsizes for space but ups the style quotient for office, entryway or bedroom. Discreet sleek dual drawers organize desk supplies and papers, keys and mail (perfect entry console), even cosmetics (makes a great vanity, too).  Pair with a modern office chair for a chic and functional space.
Features: Engineered wood with hi-gloss white lacquer
Clean with soft dry or damp cloth

SKU574725.Name: Fullerton Modular Desk with 2 Legs
SKU574725.Description: Work from home. Modern metal desk works hard to look chic round the clock. Minimalist black metal frame creates an airy base for sleek marble top. Learn about Ceci Thompson on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Clean with soft cloth; use marble cleaner on marble top

SKU574758.Name: Fullerton Modular Desk with 2 Drawers
SKU574758.Description: Work from home. Warm wood and metal desk works hard round the clock. Two sets of drawers makes plenty of space for desk accessories, with bottom drawers designed for hanging files. Marble top always keeps tip-top form. Learn about Ceci Thompson on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Clean with soft cloth; use marble cleaner on marble top

SKU574700.Name: Fullerton Modular Desk with Drawer and Leg
SKU574700.Description: Work from home. Warm wood and metal desk works hard round the clock. Set of drawers make space for desk accessories, with a bottom drawer designed for hanging files. Minimalist black metal frame creates an airy base for marble top that always looks sleek. Learn about Ceci Thompson on our blog. CB2 exclusive.

Dimentions.productName: Fullerton Modular Desk with Drawer and Leg

Features: Drawers can be configured on right or left side
Clean with soft cloth; use marble cleaner on marble top

SKU680051.Name: Peekaboo Acrylic Desk
SKU680051.Description: now you see it. now you don't. This transparent new desk floats in the room without taking up permanent visual residency. Thick-cut plexi in one seamless turn adds clean mod edge to the office or any workspace. Priced to disappear quickly, too. Pair with a modern office chair for a chic and functional space.
Features: Clean with mild soap and water; dry with soft cloth

SKU235811.Name: Avalon Desk
SKU235811.Description: snake charmer. Divine gray shagreen is corner-office luxe on a minimal modern frame. Designed by HettlerTülllman, striking slim profile desk is completely wrapped in faux embossed snakeskin-like shagreen, completely by hand. Braced by an open structure brushed-nickel frame, silhouette is the picture of chic sophistication. Three drawers provide ample storage, middle drawer front flips down to easily access computer keyboard. Pair with a modern office chair for a chic and functional space.
Features: Engineered wood frame wrapped in faux shagreen
Three drawers with nickel-plated iron hardware and metal glides

SKU578662.Name: Dahlia Marble Desk
SKU578662.Description: major promotion. This beauty just might have you volunteering for a little weekend work. Old-world elegance of white Banswara marble works a modern angle on a brilliant brass base. A cue to its quality, hi-gloss lacquer is hand-applied to the frame for an ultra-polished finish. Both modern and timeless, desk is an instant heirloom.For tips on transforming your home office into a pretty, practical workplace, head to Idea Central. dahlia marble desk is a CB2 exclusive.
Features: Clean with a soft, dry cloth
Protect marble from liquids; use coasters when possible

SKU486687.Name: Avalon Hi-Gloss White Desk
SKU486687.Description: This works. Hi-Gloss White Desk is corner-office luxe on a minimal modern frame. Designed by Hettler.Tülllman, striking slim profile is completely covered in chic white lacquer. Braced by an open structure brushed-nickel frame, silhouette is the picture of sophistication. Three drawers provide ample storage, middle drawer front flips down to easily access computer keyboard.  Learn about Hettler.Tüllmann on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Engineered wood frame coated in hi-gloss white lacquer
Three drawers with nickel tinted iron hardware and metal glides

SKU222727.Name: Ryder Desk
SKU222727.Description: Mermelada Estudio's design, with clean lines and minimalist form, lets the tone, grain and movement of suar wood do all the talking. Sleek office desk is commanding on its own and pairs with the Ryder 4-drawer file cabinet and open-shelving bookcases for max office style and storage. Learn more about Mermelada Estudio on our blog. CB2 exclusive.
Features: Wipe clean with a soft cloth

SKU509963.Name: Stairway Black 72.5" Desk
SKU509963.Description: Pitch black. Minimalism scales for small spaces in rich black. A shorter version of  a CB2 favorite, sleek desktop surface and one shelf ladder up in engineered wood with dark lacquer. Powdercoated aluminum frame with hidden hardware accentuates spotless rise. Mounts sturdy to the wall. Create a vertical library with Stairway Black Wall Mounted Bookcase. CB2 exclusive. Pair with a modern office chair for a chic and functional space.
Features: Engineered wood desktop and one upper shelf with black lacquer

SKU510004.Name: Stairway Black 96" Desk
SKU510004.Description: Pitch black. Minimalism scales for small spaces in rich black. A taller version of a CB2 favorite, sleek desktop surface and three shelves ladder up in engineered wood with dark lacquer. Powdercoated aluminum frame with hidden hardware accentuates spotless rise. Mounts sturdy to the wall. Create a vertical library with stairway Black Wall Mounted Bookcase. CB2 exclusive. Pair with a modern office chair for a chic and functional space.
Features: Engineered wood desktop and three upper shelves with black lacquer

SKU449891.Name: Stairway White 72.5" Desk
SKU449891.Description: height of white. Minimalism scales for small spaces in clean, pristine white. A shorter version of our tall stairway white desk, sleek desktop surface and one shelf ladder up in engineered wood with glossy lacquer. Slick powdercoated aluminum frame with hidden hardware accentuates spotless rise of white. Mounts sturdy to the wall. Create a vertical library with stairway white wall-mounted bookcase. Coordinate with a modern office chair for a stylish and functional space.
Features: Engineered wood desktop and one upper shelf with hi-gloss white lacquer

SKU196072.Name: Stairway White 96" Desk
SKU196072.Description: height of white. Minimalism scales to the max in clean, pristine white. Sleek desktop surface and three shelves ladder sky high (a CB2 record high at 8 feet) in engineered wood with glossy lacquer. Slick powdercoated aluminum frame with hidden hardware accentuates spotless rise of white. Mounts sturdy to the wall. Create a vertical library with stairway white wall-mounted bookcase. Coordinate with a modern office chair for a stylish and functional space.
Features: Engineered wood desktop and three upper shelves with hi-gloss white lacquer
